Homeland Security revokes temporary status for 532,000 Cubans, Haitians, Nicaraguans and Venezuelans  —  The Department of Homeland Security said Friday that it will revoke legal protections for hundreds of thousands of Cubans, Haitians, Nicaraguans and Venezuelans, setting them up for potential deportation in about a month.
